languages.text: "Но если вы все же сможете кого-то прикончить, сделайте это побольнее. Если господам не хватит предсмертной агонии — на арену выпустят меня. И вы пожалеете об этом. Ясно?"
"But should you kill something after all, do it painfully. Unless the masters' craving for death agony is sated, they will release me into the arena. And you will regret that. Got it?"
languages.original_text: "Но если вы все же сможете кого-то прикончить, сделайте это побольнее. Если господам не хватит предсмертной агонии — на арену выпустят меня. И вы пожалеете об этом. Ясно?"

traits.locale_text: "But should you kill something after all, do it painfully. If the masters' craving for death agony is not sated, they will release me into the arena. And you will regret that. Got it?"
"But should you kill something after all, do it painfully. If the masters' craving for death agony is not sated, they will release me into the arena. And you will regret that. Got it?"
"But should you kill something after all, do it painfully. Unless the masters' craving for death agony is sated, they will release me into the arena. And you will regret that. Got it?"
"But should you kill something after all, do it painfully. Unless the masters' craving for death agony is sated, they will release me into the arena. And you will regret that. Got it?"
"But should you kill something after all, do it painfully. Unless the masters' craving for death agony is sated, they will release me into the arena. And you will regret that. Got it?"
"But should you kill something after all, do it painfully. Unless the masters' craving for death agony is sated, they will release me into the arena. And you will regret that. Got it?"

languages.text: « Mais si vous parvenez à tuer quelqu'un ou quelque chose, assurez-vous de le faire souffrir. Si la soif d'agonie de mes maîtres n'est pas étanchée, ils me renverront dans l'arène. Et croyez-moi, vous ne voulez pas que cela arrive. C'est compris ? »
languages.original_text: "But should you kill something after all, do it painfully. Unless the masters' craving for death agony is sated, they will release me into the arena. And you will regret that. Got it?"

traits.locale_text: « Mais si vous parvenez à tuer quelqu'un ou quelque chose, assurez-vous de le faire souffrir. Si la soif d'agonie de mes maîtres n'est pas étanchée, ils me renverront dans l'arène. Et croyez-moi, vous ne voulez pas que cela arrive. C'est compris ? »

languages.text: “不过，如果你们真的打算杀点什么的话，就尽情去杀吧，让它们痛苦不已。如果主人们对死亡与痛苦的渴望没有满足，他们就会把我丢到竞技场里。到了那个时候，你们肯定会后悔。听明白了吗？”
languages.original_text: "But should you kill something after all, do it painfully. Unless the masters' craving for death agony is sated, they will release me into the arena. And you will regret that. Got it?"

traits.locale_text: “不过，如果你们真的打算杀点什么的话，就尽情去杀吧，让它们痛苦不已。如果主人们对死亡与痛苦的渴望没有满足，他们就会把我丢到竞技场里。到了那个时候，你们肯定会后悔。听明白了吗？”

languages.text: 「どのみち殺さなきゃいけないなら、むごたらしく殺すことだ。死の苦しみへの渇望が満たされない限り、ご主人様たちは俺を闘技場に放し続ける。そうなれば貴様は後悔することになる。分かるか？」
languages.original_text: "But should you kill something after all, do it painfully. Unless the masters' craving for death agony is sated, they will release me into the arena. And you will regret that. Got it?"

traits.locale_text: 「どのみち殺さなきゃいけないなら、むごたらしく殺すことだ。死の苦しみへの渇望が満たされない限り、ご主人様たちは俺を闘技場に放し続ける。そうなれば貴様は後悔することになる。分かるか？」

languages.text: "Aber wenn Ihr schon jemanden tötet, dann müsst Ihr auch Schmerzen bereiten. Sollte das Verlangen der Meister nach Todesqualen nicht gestillt werden, lande ich am Ende noch in der Arena. Und das werdet Ihr bereuen. Verstanden?"
languages.original_text: "But should you kill something after all, do it painfully. Unless the masters' craving for death agony is sated, they will release me into the arena. And you will regret that. Got it?"

traits.locale_text: "Aber wenn Ihr schon jemanden tötet, dann müsst Ihr auch Schmerzen bereiten. Sollte das Verlangen der Meister nach Todesqualen nicht gestillt werden, lande ich am Ende noch in der Arena. Und das werdet Ihr bereuen. Verstanden?"

languages.text: «Pero si lográis matar algo después de todo, procurad que sea lo más doloroso posible. Si los amos no ven satisfecha su sed de agonía y muerte, me soltarán a mí en la arena. Y vosotros no queréis eso. ¿Habéis entendido?».
languages.original_text: "But should you kill something after all, do it painfully. Unless the masters' craving for death agony is sated, they will release me into the arena. And you will regret that. Got it?"

traits.locale_text: «Pero si lográis matar algo después de todo, procurad que sea lo más doloroso posible. Si los amos no ven satisfecha su sed de agonía y muerte, me soltarán a mí en la arena. Y vosotros no queréis eso. ¿Habéis entendido?».

languages.text: "İlla bir şeyi öldüreceksen acı çektirdiğine emin ol. Efendilerin azaba susamışlığı tatmin olmazsa beni arenaya bırakırlar, sen de buna tanık olduğuna pişman olursun. Anladın mı?"
languages.original_text: "But should you kill something after all, do it painfully. Unless the masters' craving for death agony is sated, they will release me into the arena. And you will regret that. Got it?"

traits.locale_text: "İlla bir şeyi öldüreceksen acı çektirdiğine emin ol. Efendilerin azaba susamışlığı tatmin olmazsa beni arenaya bırakırlar, sen de buna tanık olduğuna pişman olursun. Anladın mı?"
